verbose_text: The expression of Plexin-A1 in rat microglia has also been identified, suggesting that Sema3A produced by injured neurons suppresses neuroinflammation by inducing apoptosis of activated microglia through binding to the Neuropilin-1-Plexin-A1 coreceptor complex.
evidence: Sema3A produced by injured neurons suppresses neuroinflammation by inducing apoptosis
